message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.NI 

The paper deals with erasure codes, which are commonly studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS) communities. The use of locality in the codes suggests that it may also be relevant to the distributed computing (cs.DC) and systems and control (cs.SI) communities. Finally, the use of regenerating codes suggests that it may also be relevant to the networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) community.
